c1.name: Burst Forth With Vigor, But Enter in Silence
c1.descriptionRaw:
After using the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11262}Heaven and Earth Made Manifest{/LINK}</color>, Zibai will immediately gain 100 {LINK#N11260001}<color=#FFD780FF>Phase Shift Radiance</color>{/LINK}, and the max number of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Steed's Stride</color> usages per <color=#FFD780FF>Lunar Phase Shift</color> mode is increased to 5 times.
Additionally, each time you switch to the Lunar Phase Shift mode, the first Spirit Steed's Stride's 2nd-hit Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG is increased by 220%.
c1.description:
After using the Elemental Skill **Heaven and Earth Made Manifest**, Zibai will immediately gain 100 **Phase Shift Radiance**, and the max number of Spirit Steed's Stride usages per Lunar Phase Shift mode is increased to 5 times.
Additionally, each time you switch to the Lunar Phase Shift mode, the first Spirit Steed's Stride's 2nd-hit Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG is increased by 220%.

c2.name: At Birth Are Souls Born, and in Death Leave But Husks
c2.descriptionRaw:
When in the {LINK#N11260001}<color=#FFD780FF>Lunar Phase Shift</color>{/LINK} mode, all nearby party members' Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG is increased by 30%.

<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>: Ascension Talent <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#P1262101}The Selenic Adeptus Descends{/LINK}</color> is enhanced: the DMG dealt by the 2nd hit of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Steed's Stride</color> is further increased by 550% of Zibai's DEF. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "The Selenic Adeptus Descends."
c2.description:
When in the **Lunar Phase Shift** mode, all nearby party members' Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG is increased by 30%.

Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Ascension Talent **The Selenic Adeptus Descends** is enhanced: the DMG dealt by the 2nd hit of Spirit Steed's Stride is further increased by 550% of Zibai's DEF. You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "The Selenic Adeptus Descends."

c3.name: Free From Constraints and Worldly Ties
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11262}Heaven and Earth Made Manifest{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Elemental Skill **Heaven and Earth Made Manifest** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: The Spirit Passes, Then Form Follows
c4.descriptionRaw: While in the {LINK#N11260001}<color=#FFD780FF>Lunar Phase Shift</color>{/LINK} mode, Zibai's Normal Attack sequence will not reset, and when <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Steed's Stride</color> hits opponents, Zibai will gain the <color=#FFD780FF>"Scattermoon Splendor"</color> effect: The next time she uses Normal Attacks, the additional attack from her 4th hit will deal 250% of the original damage as Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG.
c4.description: While in the **Lunar Phase Shift** mode, Zibai's Normal Attack sequence will not reset, and when Spirit Steed's Stride hits opponents, Zibai will gain the "Scattermoon Splendor" effect: The next time she uses Normal Attacks, the additional attack from her 4th hit will deal 250% of the original damage as Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG.

c5.name: Perceive the Worthless and Debate It Not
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>{LINK#S11265}Tri-Sphere Eminence{/LINK}</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of **Tri-Sphere Eminence** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The World, A Journey in Passing
c6.descriptionRaw:
While Zibai is in the {LINK#N11260001}<color=#FFD780FF>Lunar Phase Shift</color>{/LINK} mode, her <color=#FFD780FF>Phase Shift Radiance</color> gain rate is increased by 50%.
Additionally, <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Steed's Stride</color> will change such that it will consume all Phase Shift Radiance. This will {LINK#N11190007}<color=#FFD780FF>elevate</color>{/LINK} the DMG dealt by this instance of Spirit Steed's Stride and the Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG dealt by Zibai within the next 3s by 1.6% for every point consumed above 70. This effect cannot stack.
c6.description:
While Zibai is in the **Lunar Phase Shift** mode, her Phase Shift Radiance gain rate is increased by 50%.
Additionally, Spirit Steed's Stride will change such that it will consume all Phase Shift Radiance. This will **elevate** the DMG dealt by this instance of Spirit Steed's Stride and the Lunar-Crystallize Reaction DMG dealt by Zibai within the next 3s by 1.6% for every point consumed above 70. This effect cannot stack.
